Collaboration Guide

Learn how to contribute and collaborate with the Flamingalo community.

ü§ù How to Contribute

Flamingalo is built by the community, for the community. We welcome contributions of all kinds:

  • üé® Art installations and performances
  • üé™ Theme camps and workshops
  • üõ†Ô∏è Infrastructure and logistics support
  • üíª Website and tech development
  • üì¢ Marketing and community outreach

üìö Getting Started

To get started with collaboration:

  1. Join our Telegram group
  2. Read the Survival Guide
  3. Introduce yourself and share your ideas
  4. Connect with other collaborators

üî• The 10 Principles

All collaborations at Flamingalo are guided by the 10 Principles of Burning Man:

  • Radical Inclusion
  • Gifting
  • Decommodification
  • Radical Self-reliance
  • Radical Self-expression
  • Communal Effort
  • Civic Responsibility
  • Leaving No Trace
  • Participation
  • Immediacy
